1.0.3.name: wordpress/dashboard-draft-posts
1.0.3.description:
This plugin is no longer needed as WordPress 2.7 has a drafts dashboard widget out of the box.

WordPress 2.5 introduces a widgetized dashboard featuring the latest comments and WordPress news.

This plugin creates a new widget for that dashboard that lists out drafts for those wanting to see that data directly on their dashboard.

See Also: Dashboard Widget Manager
